1️⃣ Главная (фильтрация категорий)

DOMAIN

kotlin
// domain/model/Product.kt
data class Product(
    val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double,
    val category: String,
    val image: String
)

kotlin
// domain/repository/ProductRepository.kt
interface ProductRepository {
    suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product>
}

kotlin
// domain/usecase/GetProductsUseCase.kt
class GetProductsUseCase(private val repo: ProductRepository) {
    suspend operator fun invoke() = repo.getProducts()
}

DATA

kotlin
// data/remote/ProductApi.kt
interface ProductApi {
    @GET("products")
    suspend fun getProducts(): List<ProductDto>
}

kotlin
// data/repository/ProductRepositoryImpl.kt
class ProductRepositoryImpl(
    private val api: ProductApi
) : ProductRepository {

    override suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product> {
        return api.getProducts().map { it.toDomain() }
    }
}

PRESENTATION

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class MainViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val getProducts: GetProductsUseCase
) : ViewModel() {

    private val _products = MutableLiveData<List<Product>>()
    val products: LiveData<List<Product>> = _products

    fun load() {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            _products.value = getProducts()
        }
    }

    fun filter(category: String) {
        _products.value = _products.value?.filter { it.category == category }
    }
}

XML (fragment_main.xml)

xml
<LinearLayout
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:padding="16dp">

    <HorizontalScrollView>
        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/categoryContainer"
            android:orientation="horizontal"/>
    </HorizontalScrollView>

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/recycler"/>
</LinearLayout>

interface CartRepository {
    suspend fun add(product: Product)
    suspend fun remove(product: Product)
    suspend fun getAll(): List<Product>
}

DATA (Room)

kotlin
@Entity
data class CartEntity(
    @PrimaryKey val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val price: Double
)

kotlin
@Dao
interface CartDao {
    @Insert(onConflict = REPLACE)
    suspend fun insert(item: CartEntity)

    @Delete
    suspend fun delete(item: CartEntity)

    @Query("SELECT * FROM CartEntity")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<CartEntity>
}

🌐 Обработка ошибок сервера

kotlin
sealed class NetworkResult<T> {
    class Success<T>(val data: T) : NetworkResult<T>()
    class Error<T>(val message: String) : NetworkResult<T>()
}

В ViewModel:

kotlin

    repo.getProducts()
} catch (e: Exception) {

🔔 Уведомление 3 минуты неактивности проекта

kotlin
Handler(Looper.getMainLooper()).postDelayed({
    sendNotification()
}, 180000)

🔔 Уведомление если не заходил >1 мин

Используем ProcessLifecycleOwner

kotlin
class App : Application(), LifecycleObserver {

    private var lastExitTime = 0L

    override fun onCreate() {
        ProcessLifecycleOwner.get().lifecycle.addObserver(this)
    }

    @OnLifecycleEvent(Lifecycle.Event.ON_STOP)
    fun onBackground() {
        lastExitTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
    }

    @OnLifecycleEvent(Lifecycle.Event.ON_START)
    fun onForeground() {
        if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastExitTime > 60000) {
            sendNotification()
        }
    }
}

✅ SOLID соблюдено

  • S — ViewModel не работает с Retrofit напрямую

  • O — можно заменить сетевую библиотеку

  • L — репозитории через интерфейсы

  • I — интерфейсы разделены

  • D — зависимости через Hilt

5️⃣ DATA слой (REST + абстракция)

Repository (Domain)

kotlin
interface ProductRepository {
    suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product>
}

Retrofit API

kotlin
interface ApiService {

    @GET("products")
    suspend fun getProducts(): List<ProductDto>

}

Реализация

kotlin
class ProductRepositoryImpl(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val dao: ProductDao
) : ProductRepository {

    override suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product> {
        return try {
            val remote = api.getProducts()
            dao.insertAll(remote.map { it.toEntity() })
            remote.map { it.toDomain() }
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            dao.getAll().map { it.toDomain() }
        }
    }
}

✔ Если нет сети → берем из кэша

6️⃣ Room кэш

kotlin
@Entity
data class ProductEntity(
    @PrimaryKey val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val price: Double
)

kotlin
@Dao
interface ProductDao {

    @Query("SELECT * FROM ProductEntity")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<ProductEntity>

    @Insert(onConflict = REPLACE)
    suspend fun insertAll(list: List<ProductEntity>)
}

7️⃣ Сессия (DataStore)

kotlin
val Context.dataStore by preferencesDataStore("session")

suspend fun saveSession(token: String) {
    context.dataStore.edit {
        it[stringPreferencesKey("token")] = token
    }
}

    sendNotification()

1 минута вне приложения

kotlin
@OnLifecycleEvent(Lifecycle.Event.ON_STOP)
fun onBackground() {
    lastExit = System.currentTimeMillis()
}

@OnLifecycleEvent(Lifecycle.Event.ON_START)
fun onForeground() {
    if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastExit > 60000) {
        sendNotification()
    }
}

3️⃣ Retrofit Config

NetworkModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    private const val BASE_URL = "https://YOUR_POCKETBASE_URL/api/"

    @Provides
    fun provideOkHttp(tokenManager: TokenManager): OkHttpClient {
        return OkHttpClient.Builder()
            .addInterceptor { chain ->
                val request = chain.request().newBuilder()
                val token = tokenManager.getToken()
                if (token != null) {
                    request.addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer $token")
                }
                chain.proceed(request.build())
            }
            .addInterceptor(HttpLoggingInterceptor().apply {
                level = HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY
            })
            .build()
    }

    @Provides
    fun provideRetrofit(client: OkHttpClient): Retrofit =
        Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
            .client(client)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()

    @Provides
    fun provideApi(retrofit: Retrofit): PocketBaseApi =
        retrofit.create(PocketBaseApi::class.java)
}

4️⃣ API интерфейс

kotlin
interface PocketBaseApi {

    // Авторизация
    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun auth(@Body body: AuthRequest): AuthResponse

    // Получить товары
    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): ProductResponse

    // Создать проект
    @Multipart
    @POST("collections/projects/records")
    suspend fun createProject(
        @Part("title") title: RequestBody,
        @Part("description") description: RequestBody,
        @Part image: MultipartBody.Part
    ): ProjectDto
}

5️⃣ DTO модели

    val password: String
)

    val token: String

    val items: List<ProductDto>

6️⃣ TokenManager (DataStore)

kotlin
@Singleton
class TokenManager @Inject constructor(
    @ApplicationContext private val context: Context
) {

    private val Context.dataStore by preferencesDataStore("session")
    private val TOKEN_KEY = stringPreferencesKey("token")

    suspend fun saveToken(token: String) {
        context.dataStore.edit {
            it[TOKEN_KEY] = token
        }
    }

    suspend fun clear() {
        context.dataStore.edit { it.clear() }
    }

    fun getToken(): String? {
        val prefs = runBlocking {
            context.dataStore.data.first()
        }
        return prefs[TOKEN_KEY]
    }
}

7️⃣ Repository

kotlin
class ProductRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: PocketBaseApi,
    private val dao: ProductDao
) : ProductRepository {

    override suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product> {
        return try {
            val response = api.getProducts()
            dao.insertAll(response.items.map { it.toEntity() })
            response.items.map { it.toDomain() }
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            dao.getAll().map { it.toDomain() }
        }
    }
}

8️⃣ Авторизация

kotlin
class AuthRepository @Inject constructor(
    private val api: PocketBaseApi,
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) {

    suspend fun login(email: String, password: String): Boolean {
        return try {
            val response = api.auth(AuthRequest(email, password))
            tokenManager.saveToken(response.token)
            true
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }
}

9️⃣ Загрузка фото в проект

kotlin
fun prepareFilePart(uri: Uri): MultipartBody.Part {
    val file = File(uri.path!!)
    val requestFile =
        file.asRequestBody("image/*".toMediaTypeOrNull())
    return MultipartBody.Part.createFormData("image", file.name, requestFile)
}

🔟 Создание проекта

kotlin
suspend fun createProject(title: String, desc: String, uri: Uri) {
    val titleBody = title.toRequestBody("text/plain".toMediaType())
    val descBody = desc.toRequestBody("text/plain".toMediaType())
    val imagePart = prepareFilePart(uri)

    api.createProject(titleBody, descBody, imagePart)
}

/**
 * Кнопка Matule с состояниями ENABLED / DISABLED
 */
class MatuleButton @JvmOverloads constructor(
    context: Context,
    attrs: AttributeSet? = null
) : AppCompatButton(context, attrs) {

    init {
        setBackgroundColor(MatuleColors.Primary)
        setTextColor(Color.WHITE)
        isAllCaps = false
    }

    fun setEnabledState(enabled: Boolean) {
        isEnabled = enabled
        alpha = if (enabled) 1f else 0.5f
    }
}

) : TextInputLayout(context, attrs) {

        error = message
        boxStrokeColor = MatuleColors.Error
    }
}

🌐 3. NETWORK (Sprint 2)

ApiService.kt

kotlin
/**
 * REST API PocketBase
 */
interface ApiService {

    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun login(@Body request: LoginRequest): LoginResponse

    @POST("collections/users/records")
    suspend fun register(@Body request: RegisterRequest): UserDto

    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): ProductResponse
}

NetworkResult.kt

kotlin
sealed class NetworkResult<T> {
    data class Success<T>(val data: T): NetworkResult<T>()
    data class Error<T>(val message: String): NetworkResult<T>()
}

NetworkRepository.kt

kotlin
/**
 * Абстракция сетевого слоя
 */
interface NetworkRepository {
    suspend fun login(email: String, pass: String): NetworkResult<String>
}

NetworkRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class NetworkRepositoryImpl(
    private val api: ApiService
): NetworkRepository {

    override suspend fun login(email: String, pass: String)
    : NetworkResult<String> {
        return try {
            val response = api.login(LoginRequest(email, pass))
            NetworkResult.Success(response.token)
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            NetworkResult.Error("Ошибка сети")
        }
    }
}

private fun isValidEmail(email: String): Boolean {
    val regex = Regex("^[a-z0-9]+@[a-z0-9]+\\.ru$")
    return regex.matches(email)
}

LoginViewModel.kt

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class LoginViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val loginUseCase: LoginUseCase
): ViewModel() {

    val state = MutableLiveData<NetworkResult<Unit>>()

    fun login(email: String, pass: String) {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            state.value = loginUseCase(email, pass)
        }
    }
}

🔹 CreatePasswordFragment

Проверка надежности:

kotlin
fun isStrong(pass: String): Boolean {
    val regex =
        Regex("^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[!@#\$%^&*()_+]).{8,}$")
    return regex.matches(pass)
}

kotlin
private val pin = StringBuilder()

fun onDigitClick(d: String) {
    if (pin.length < 4) {
        pin.append(d)
    }
    if (pin.length == 4) {
        navigateToMain()
    }
}

💾 6. DataStore (Сессия)

kotlin
object TokenManager {

    private lateinit var dataStore: DataStore<Preferences>
    private val TOKEN = stringPreferencesKey("token")

    fun init(context: Context) {
        dataStore = context.createDataStore("session")
    }

    suspend fun save(token: String) {
        dataStore.edit { it[TOKEN] = token }
    }

    fun isLogged(): Boolean {
        return runBlocking {
            dataStore.data.first()[TOKEN] != null
        }
    }
}

 * Универсальная кнопка Matule
 */
class MatuleButton @JvmOverloads constructor(
    context: Context,
    attrs: AttributeSet? = null
) : AppCompatButton(context, attrs) {

    init {
        setBackgroundColor(MatuleColors.PRIMARY)
        setTextColor(Color.WHITE)
        isAllCaps = false
        textSize = 16f
    }

    fun setLoading(loading: Boolean) {
        isEnabled = !loading
        alpha = if (loading) 0.5f else 1f
    }
}

📁 MatuleInput.kt

kotlin
/**
 * Поле ввода с поддержкой ошибки
 */
class MatuleInput @JvmOverloads constructor(
    context: Context,
    attrs: AttributeSet? = null
) : TextInputLayout(context, attrs) {

    fun showError(message: String) {
        error = message
        setBoxStrokeColorStateList(
            ColorStateList.valueOf(MatuleColors.ERROR)
        )
    }

    fun clearError() {
        error = null
    }
}

/**
 * REST API PocketBase
 */
interface ApiService {

    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun login(
        @Body request: LoginRequest
    ): LoginResponse

    @POST("collections/users/records")
    suspend fun register(
        @Body request: RegisterRequest
    ): UserDto

    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): ProductResponse
}

📁 NetworkResult.kt

kotlin
sealed class NetworkResult<T> {
    data class Success<T>(val data: T) : NetworkResult<T>()
    data class Error<T>(val message: String) : NetworkResult<T>()
}

📁 NetworkRepository.kt

kotlin
interface NetworkRepository {

    suspend fun login(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<String>

    suspend fun register(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit>
}

📁 NetworkRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class NetworkRepositoryImpl(
    private val api: ApiService
) : NetworkRepository {

    override suspend fun login(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<String> {

        return try {
            val response = api.login(
                LoginRequest(email, password)
            )
            NetworkResult.Success(response.token)
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            NetworkResult.Error("Ошибка сети")
        }
    }

    override suspend fun register(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit> {

        return try {
            api.register(
                RegisterRequest(email, password, password)
            )
            NetworkResult.Success(Unit)
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            NetworkResult.Error("Ошибка регистрации")
        }
    }
}

2️⃣ HILT DI

📁 NetworkModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideRetrofit(): Retrofit {
        val logging = HttpLoggingInterceptor()
        logging.level = HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY

        val client = OkHttpClient.Builder()
            .addInterceptor(logging)
            .build()

        return Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl("https://YOUR_POCKETBASE_URL/api/")
            .client(client)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
    }

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideApi(retrofit: Retrofit): ApiService =
        retrofit.create(ApiService::class.java)
}

3️⃣ TOKEN ХРАНЕНИЕ (DataStore)

📁 TokenManager.kt

kotlin
@Singleton
class TokenManager @Inject constructor(
    @ApplicationContext private val context: Context
) {

    private val Context.dataStore by preferencesDataStore("matule")

    private val TOKEN = stringPreferencesKey("token")

    suspend fun saveToken(token: String) {
        context.dataStore.edit {
            it[TOKEN] = token
        }
    }

    val tokenFlow = context.dataStore.data.map {
        it[TOKEN]
    }

    suspend fun clear() {
        context.dataStore.edit {
            it.clear()
        }
    }
}

@Entity(tableName = "products")
data class ProductEntity(

    val title: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double
)

📁 ProductDao.kt

kotlin
@Dao
interface ProductDao {

    @Query("SELECT * FROM products")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<ProductEntity>

    @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.REPLACE)
    suspend fun insertAll(products: List<ProductEntity>)

    @Query("DELETE FROM products")
    suspend fun clear()
}

📁 AppDatabase.kt

kotlin
@Database(
    entities = [ProductEntity::class],
    version = 1
)
abstract class AppDatabase : RoomDatabase() {
    abstract fun productDao(): ProductDao
}

📁 DatabaseModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object DatabaseModule {

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideDb(@ApplicationContext context: Context): AppDatabase {
        return Room.databaseBuilder(
            context,
            AppDatabase::class.java,
            "matule.db"
        ).build()
    }

    @Provides
    fun provideDao(db: AppDatabase): ProductDao =
        db.productDao()
}

5️⃣ AUTH REPOSITORY

📁 AuthRepository.kt

kotlin
interface AuthRepository {

    suspend fun login(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit>

    suspend fun register(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit>

    suspend fun logout()
}

📁 AuthRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class AuthRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : AuthRepository {

    override suspend fun login(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit> {

        return try {
            val response = api.login(
                LoginRequest(email, password)
            )

            tokenManager.saveToken(response.token)
            NetworkResult.Success(Unit)

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            NetworkResult.Error("Неверные данные")
        }
    }

    override suspend fun register(
        email: String,
        password: String
    ): NetworkResult<Unit> {

        return try {
            api.register(
                RegisterRequest(email, password, password)
            )
            NetworkResult.Success(Unit)

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            NetworkResult.Error("Ошибка регистрации")
        }
    }

    override suspend fun logout() {
        tokenManager.clear()
    }
}

6️⃣ PRODUCT REPOSITORY

📁 ProductRepository.kt

kotlin
interface ProductRepository {

    suspend fun getProducts(): List<ProductEntity>
}

📁 ProductRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class ProductRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val dao: ProductDao
) : ProductRepository {

    override suspend fun getProducts(): List<ProductEntity> {

        return try {
            val response = api.getProducts()

            val entities = response.items.map {
                ProductEntity(
                    id = it.id,
                    title = it.title,
                    description = it.description,
                    price = it.price
                )
            }

            dao.clear()
            dao.insertAll(entities)

            entities

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            dao.getAll()
        }
    }
}

7️⃣ LOGIN VIEWMODEL

📁 LoginViewModel.kt

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class LoginViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val repo: AuthRepository
) : ViewModel() {

    private val _state = MutableLiveData<LoginState>()
    val state: LiveData<LoginState> = _state

    fun login(email: String, password: String) {

        if (email.isBlank() || password.isBlank()) {
            _state.value = LoginState.Error("Заполните поля")
            return
        }

        viewModelScope.launch {

            _state.value = LoginState.Loading

            when (repo.login(email, password)) {

                is NetworkResult.Success ->
                    _state.value = LoginState.Success

                is NetworkResult.Error ->
                    _state.value = LoginState.Error("Ошибка входа")
            }
        }
    }
}

📁 LoginState.kt

kotlin
sealed class LoginState {
    object Loading : LoginState()
    object Success : LoginState()
    data class Error(val message: String) : LoginState()
}

8️⃣ REGISTER VIEWMODEL

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class RegisterViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val repo: AuthRepository
) : ViewModel() {

    private val _state = MutableLiveData<RegisterState>()
    val state: LiveData<RegisterState> = _state

    fun register(email: String, password: String) {

        if (password.length < 6) {
            _state.value = RegisterState.Error("Минимум 6 символов")
            return
        }

        viewModelScope.launch {

            _state.value = RegisterState.Loading

            when (repo.register(email, password)) {

                is NetworkResult.Success ->
                    _state.value = RegisterState.Success

                is NetworkResult.Error ->
                    _state.value = RegisterState.Error("Ошибка")
            }
        }
    }
}

9️⃣ CATALOG VIEWMODEL

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class CatalogViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val repo: ProductRepository
) : ViewModel() {

    private val _products = MutableLiveData<List<ProductEntity>>()
    val products: LiveData<List<ProductEntity>> = _products

    fun load() {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            _products.value = repo.getProducts()
        }
    }
}

🔟 LOGIN ACTIVITY ЛОГИКА

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class LoginActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var binding: ActivityLoginBinding
    private val vm: LoginViewModel by viewModels()

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        binding = ActivityLoginBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
        setContentView(binding.root)

        binding.btnLogin.setOnClickListener {
            vm.login(
                binding.etEmail.text.toString(),
                binding.etPassword.text.toString()
            )
        }

        vm.state.observe(this) {

            when (it) {

                is LoginState.Loading -> {
                    binding.progress.visibility = View.VISIBLE
                }

                is LoginState.Success -> {
                    startActivity(
                        Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java)
                    )
                    finish()
                }

                is LoginState.Error -> {
                    binding.progress.visibility = View.GONE
                    Toast.makeText(
                        this,
                        it.message,
                        Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
                    ).show()
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

1️⃣1️⃣ CATALOG ADAPTER

kotlin
class ProductAdapter :
    RecyclerView.Adapter<ProductAdapter.Holder>() {

    private var items = listOf<ProductEntity>()

    fun submit(list: List<ProductEntity>) {
        items = list
        notifyDataSetChanged()
    }

    inner class Holder(val binding: ItemProductBinding)
        : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(binding.root)

    override fun onCreateViewHolder(
        parent: ViewGroup,
        viewType: Int
    ): Holder {

        val binding = ItemProductBinding.inflate(
            LayoutInflater.from(parent.context),
            parent,
            false
        )
        return Holder(binding)
    }

    override fun getItemCount() = items.size

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: Holder, position: Int) {

        val item = items[position]

        holder.binding.tvTitle.text = item.title
        holder.binding.tvPrice.text = "${item.price} ₽"
    }
}

🚀 ШАГ 4. NETWORK (PocketBase REST)

ApiService.kt

kotlin
interface ApiService {

    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun login(
        @Body request: LoginRequest
    ): LoginResponse

    @POST("collections/users/records")
    suspend fun register(
        @Body request: RegisterRequest
    ): UserDto

    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): ProductResponse
}

Models.kt

kotlin
data class LoginRequest(
    val identity: String,
    val password: String
)

data class LoginResponse(
    val token: String
)

data class RegisterRequest(
    val email: String,
    val password: String,
    val passwordConfirm: String
)

data class UserDto(
    val id: String,
    val email: String
)

data class ProductResponse(
    val items: List<ProductDto>
)

data class ProductDto(
    val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double
)

🚀 ШАГ 5. HILT NETWORK MODULE

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideRetrofit(): Retrofit {

        val logging = HttpLoggingInterceptor()
        logging.level = HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY

        val client = OkHttpClient.Builder()
            .addInterceptor(logging)
            .build()

        return Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl("https://YOUR_POCKETBASE_URL/api/")
            .client(client)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
    }

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideApi(retrofit: Retrofit): ApiService =
        retrofit.create(ApiService::class.java)
}

🚀 ШАГ 6. DATASTORE (Token)

kotlin
@Singleton
class TokenManager @Inject constructor(
    @ApplicationContext private val context: Context
) {

    private val Context.dataStore by preferencesDataStore("matule")

    private val TOKEN = stringPreferencesKey("token")

    suspend fun save(token: String) {
        context.dataStore.edit {
            it[TOKEN] = token
        }
    }

    val tokenFlow = context.dataStore.data.map {
        it[TOKEN]
    }

    suspend fun clear() {
        context.dataStore.edit { it.clear() }
    }
}

🚀 ШАГ 7. ROOM

ProductEntity.kt

kotlin
@Entity(tableName = "products")
data class ProductEntity(
    @PrimaryKey val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double
)

ProductDao.kt

kotlin
@Dao
interface ProductDao {

    @Query("SELECT * FROM products")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<ProductEntity>

    @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.REPLACE)
    suspend fun insertAll(list: List<ProductEntity>)

    @Query("DELETE FROM products")
    suspend fun clear()
}

AppDatabase.kt

kotlin
@Database(
    entities = [ProductEntity::class],
    version = 1
)
abstract class AppDatabase : RoomDatabase() {
    abstract fun productDao(): ProductDao
}

DatabaseModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object DatabaseModule {

    @Provides
    @Singleton
    fun provideDb(@ApplicationContext context: Context): AppDatabase {
        return Room.databaseBuilder(
            context,
            AppDatabase::class.java,
            "matule.db"
        ).build()
    }

    @Provides
    fun provideDao(db: AppDatabase): ProductDao =
        db.productDao()
}

🚀 ШАГ 8. REPOSITORIES

AuthRepository.kt

kotlin
interface AuthRepository {
    suspend fun login(email: String, password: String): Boolean
    suspend fun register(email: String, password: String): Boolean
}

AuthRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class AuthRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : AuthRepository {

    override suspend fun login(email: String, password: String): Boolean {
        return try {
            val response = api.login(
                LoginRequest(email, password)
            )
            tokenManager.save(response.token)
            true
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }

    override suspend fun register(email: String, password: String): Boolean {
        return try {
            api.register(
                RegisterRequest(email, password, password)
            )
            true
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }
}

ProductRepository.kt

kotlin
interface ProductRepository {
    suspend fun loadProducts(): List<ProductEntity>
}

ProductRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class ProductRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val dao: ProductDao
) : ProductRepository {

    override suspend fun loadProducts(): List<ProductEntity> {

        return try {

            val response = api.getProducts()

            val list = response.items.map {
                ProductEntity(
                    id = it.id,
                    title = it.title,
                    description = it.description,
                    price = it.price
                )
            }

            dao.clear()
            dao.insertAll(list)
            list

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            dao.getAll()
        }
    }
}

🚀 ШАГ 10. LOGIN ACTIVITY

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class LoginActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var binding: ActivityLoginBinding
    private val vm: LoginViewModel by viewModels()

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        binding = ActivityLoginBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
        setContentView(binding.root)

        binding.btnLogin.setOnClickListener {
            vm.login(
                binding.etEmail.text.toString(),
                binding.etPassword.text.toString()
            )
        }

        vm.state.observe(this) { success ->

            if (success) {
                startActivity(
                    Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java)
                )
                finish()
            } else {
                Toast.makeText(
                    this,
                    "Ошибка входа",
                    Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
                ).show()
            }
        }
    }
}

🚀 ШАГ 11. MAIN + CATALOG

MainActivity.kt

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding
    private val vm: CatalogViewModel by viewModels()
    private val adapter = ProductAdapter()

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

        binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
        setContentView(binding.root)

        binding.recycler.adapter = adapter

        vm.products.observe(this) {
            adapter.submit(it)
        }

        vm.load()
    }
}

ProductAdapter.kt

kotlin
class ProductAdapter :
    RecyclerView.Adapter<ProductAdapter.Holder>() {

    private var items = listOf<ProductEntity>()

    fun submit(list: List<ProductEntity>) {
        items = list
        notifyDataSetChanged()
    }

    inner class Holder(val binding: ItemProductBinding)
        : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(binding.root)

    override fun onCreateViewHolder(
        parent: ViewGroup,
        viewType: Int
    ): Holder {

        val binding = ItemProductBinding.inflate(
            LayoutInflater.from(parent.context),
            parent,
            false
        )
        return Holder(binding)
    }

    override fun getItemCount() = items.size

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: Holder, position: Int) {

        val item = items[position]

        holder.binding.tvTitle.text = item.title
        holder.binding.tvPrice.text = "${item.price} ₽"
    }
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 1 — Splash (Sprint 3)

Логика:

  1. Проверяем есть ли токен

  2. Если есть → Pin/Biometric

  3. Если нет → Login

SplashViewModel.kt

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class SplashViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : ViewModel() {

    val navigate = MutableLiveData<Destination>()

    fun checkAuth() {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            tokenManager.tokenFlow.first()?.let {
                navigate.value = Destination.Pin
            } ?: run {
                navigate.value = Destination.Login
            }
        }
    }
}

sealed class Destination {
    object Login : Destination()
    object Pin : Destination()
}

SplashActivity.kt

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class SplashActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private val vm: SplashViewModel by viewModels()

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

        vm.navigate.observe(this) {

            when (it) {

                Destination.Login ->
                    startActivity(Intent(this, LoginActivity::class.java))

                Destination.Pin ->
                    startActivity(Intent(this, PinActivity::class.java))
            }

            finish()
        }

        vm.checkAuth()
    }
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 2 — Вход + Регистрация (Sprint 3)

Email Validation

kotlin
fun isValidEmail(email: String): Boolean {
    val regex = "^[a-z0-9]+@[a-z0-9]+\\.ru$".toRegex()
    return email.matches(regex)
}

Password Validation

kotlin
fun isStrongPassword(password: String): Boolean {

    val regex = Regex(
        "^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[\\W_]).{8,}$"
    )

    return regex.matches(password)
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 3 — Главная (Sprint 4)

Требование:

При выборе категории описания фильтруются

Domain Model

kotlin
data class Product(
    val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val category: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double
)

UseCase

kotlin
class FilterProductsUseCase @Inject constructor() {

    operator fun invoke(
        list: List<Product>,
        category: String
    ): List<Product> {

        if (category == "ALL") return list

        return list.filter {
            it.category == category
        }
    }
}

HomeViewModel

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class HomeViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val repo: ProductRepository,
    private val filterUseCase: FilterProductsUseCase
) : ViewModel() {

    val products = MutableLiveData<List<Product>>()
    private var fullList = listOf<Product>()

    fun load() {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            fullList = repo.getProducts()
            products.value = fullList
        }
    }

    fun filter(category: String) {
        products.value =
            filterUseCase(fullList, category)
    }
}

Search

kotlin
fun search(query: String) {
    products.value = fullList.filter {
        it.title.contains(query, true)
    }
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 5 — Корзина

CartEntity

kotlin
@Entity
data class CartItem(
    @PrimaryKey val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val price: Double,
    val count: Int
)

CartDao

kotlin
@Dao
interface CartDao {

    @Query("SELECT * FROM CartItem")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<CartItem>

    @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.REPLACE)
    suspend fun insert(item: CartItem)

    @Delete
    suspend fun delete(item: CartItem)

    @Query("DELETE FROM CartItem")
    suspend fun clear()
}

CartViewModel

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class CartViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val dao: CartDao
) : ViewModel() {

    val items = MutableLiveData<List<CartItem>>()

    fun load() {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            items.value = dao.getAll()
        }
    }

    fun add(product: Product) {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            dao.insert(
                CartItem(
                    product.id,
                    product.title,
                    product.price,
                    1
                )
            )
            load()
        }
    }

    fun remove(item: CartItem) {
        viewModelScope.launch {
            dao.delete(item)
            load()
        }
    }

    fun checkout(context: Context) {

        viewModelScope.launch {
            dao.clear()

            Toast.makeText(
                context,
                "Заказ успешно оформлен",
                Toast.LENGTH_LONG
            ).show()

            delay(5000)
        }
    }
}

class ProductBottomSheet(
    private val product: Product
) : BottomSheetDialogFragment() {

        inflater: LayoutInflater,
        container: ViewGroup?,
        savedInstanceState: Bundle?
    ): View {

        val view =
            inflater.inflate(R.layout.bs_product, container, false)

        view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.title).text =
            product.title

        return view
    }
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 8 — Сохранение состояния

Сохраняем последний экран

kotlin
class NavigationStorage @Inject constructor(
    private val context: Context
) {

    private val prefs =
        context.getSharedPreferences("nav", MODE_PRIVATE)

    fun save(screen: String) {
        prefs.edit().putString("last", screen).apply()
    }

    fun get(): String? =
        prefs.getString("last", null)
}

🔷 ЧАСТЬ 9 — Уведомления

1. Неактивность проекта 3 минуты

kotlin
class ProjectInactivityWorker(
    context: Context,
    params: WorkerParameters
) : Worker(context, params) {

    override fun doWork(): Result {

        sendNotification(
            "Вы давно не работали над проектом"
        )

        return Result.success()
    }
}

Запуск:

kotlin
WorkManager.getInstance(context)
    .enqueueUniqueWork(
        "project_check",
        ExistingWorkPolicy.REPLACE,
        OneTimeWorkRequestBuilder<ProjectInactivityWorker>()
            .setInitialDelay(3, TimeUnit.MINUTES)
            .build()
    )

2. Не открывал приложение 1 минуту

Сохраняем время закрытия:

kotlin
override fun onStop() {
    super.onStop()
    prefs.edit().putLong("last_exit", System.currentTimeMillis()).apply()
}

Проверяем в Splash:

kotlin
val last = prefs.getLong("last_exit", 0)
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - last > 60000) {
    sendNotification("Мы скучаем 😄")
}

===============================

2️⃣ DATA

===============================

ApiService.kt

kotlin
interface ApiService {

    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun login(@Body body: Map<String, String>): Map<String, Any>

    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): Map<String, List<Map<String, Any>>>

    @POST("collections/projects/records")
    suspend fun createProject(@Body body: Map<String, Any>)
}

TokenManager.kt

kotlin
class TokenManager(context: Context) {

    private val prefs =
        context.getSharedPreferences("auth", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)

    fun save(token: String) {
        prefs.edit().putString("token", token).apply()
    }

    fun get(): String? = prefs.getString("token", null)

    fun clear() {
        prefs.edit().clear().apply()
    }
}

RepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class RepositoryImpl(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : Repository {

    override suspend fun login(email: String, password: String): Boolean {
        return try {

            val response = api.login(
                mapOf(
                    "identity" to email,
                    "password" to password
                )
            )

            val token = response["token"] as String
            tokenManager.save(token)

            true
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }

    override suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product> {

        return try {

            val response = api.getProducts()
            val items = response["items"] ?: emptyList()

            (items as List<Map<String, Any>>).map {

                Product(
                    id = it["id"].toString(),
                    title = it["title"].toString(),
                    category = it["category"].toString(),
                    description = it["description"].toString(),
                    price = it["price"].toString().toDouble()
                )
            }

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            emptyList()
        }
    }

    override suspend fun createProject(project: Project): Boolean {

        return try {

            api.createProject(
                mapOf(
                    "title" to project.title,
                    "description" to project.description,
                    "image" to project.image
                )
            )

            true

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }
}

===============================

class SplashActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

        val token = TokenManager(this).get()

        if (token == null) {
            startActivity(Intent(this, LoginActivity::class.java))
        } else {
            startActivity(Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java))
        }

        finish()
    }
}

4️⃣ LOGIN

===============================

kotlin
class LoginActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var repository: Repository

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_login)

        repository = ServiceLocator.provideRepository(this)

        findViewById<Button>(R.id.btnLogin).setOnClickListener {

            val email = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etEmail).text.toString()
            val password = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etPassword).text.toString()

            if (!email.matches(Regex("^[a-z0-9]+@[a-z0-9]+\\.ru$"))) {
                Toast.makeText(this, "Неверный email", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
                return@setOnClickListener
            }

            lifecycleScope.launch {

                val success = repository.login(email, password)

                if (success) {
                    startActivity(Intent(this@LoginActivity, MainActivity::class.java))
                    finish()
                } else {
                    Toast.makeText(this@LoginActivity, "Ошибка входа", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

5️⃣ MAIN + FILTER

===============================

kotlin
class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var repository: Repository
    private var fullList = listOf<Product>()
    private val adapter = ProductAdapter()

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        repository = ServiceLocator.provideRepository(this)

        findViewById<RecyclerView>(R.id.recycler).adapter = adapter

        lifecycleScope.launch {

            fullList = repository.getProducts()
            adapter.submit(fullList)
        }

        findViewById<Spinner>(R.id.spinnerCategory)
            .onItemSelectedListener =
            object : AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener {

                override fun onItemSelected(
                    parent: AdapterView<*>,
                    view: View?,
                    position: Int,
                    id: Long
                ) {

                    val category = parent.getItemAtPosition(position).toString()

                    if (category == "ALL") {
                        adapter.submit(fullList)
                    } else {
                        adapter.submit(
                            fullList.filter {
                                it.category == category
                            }
                        )
                    }
                }

                override fun onNothingSelected(parent: AdapterView<*>?) {}
            }
    }
}

🟢 ШАГ 5 — DATA (PocketBase)

📁 data/ApiService.kt

kotlin
package com.example.matule.data

import retrofit2.http.*

interface ApiService {

    @POST("collections/users/auth-with-password")
    suspend fun login(@Body body: Map<String, String>): Map<String, Any>

    @GET("collections/products/records")
    suspend fun getProducts(): Map<String, List<Map<String, Any>>>

    @POST("collections/projects/records")
    suspend fun createProject(@Body body: Map<String, String>)
}

📁 data/RetrofitClient.kt

kotlin
package com.example.matule.data

import retrofit2.Retrofit
import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory

object RetrofitClient {

    private const val BASE_URL = "https://YOUR_POCKETBASE_URL/api/"

    val api: ApiService by lazy {

        Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
            .create(ApiService::class.java)
    }
}

📁 data/Repository.kt

kotlin
package com.example.matule.data

import android.content.Context
import com.example.matule.domain.Product
import com.example.matule.domain.Project

class Repository(context: Context) {

    private val api = RetrofitClient.api

    private val prefs =
        context.getSharedPreferences("auth", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)

    suspend fun login(email: String, password: String): Boolean {

        return try {

            val response = api.login(
                mapOf(
                    "identity" to email,
                    "password" to password
                )
            )

            val token = response["token"] as String
            prefs.edit().putString("token", token).apply()

            true

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }

    fun isLogged(): Boolean {
        return prefs.getString("token", null) != null
    }

    suspend fun getProducts(): List<Product> {

        return try {

            val response = api.getProducts()
            val items = response["items"] ?: emptyList()

            (items as List<Map<String, Any>>).map {

                Product(
                    id = it["id"].toString(),
                    title = it["title"].toString(),
                    category = it["category"].toString(),
                    description = it["description"].toString(),
                    price = it["price"].toString().toDouble()
                )
            }

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            emptyList()
        }
    }

    suspend fun createProject(project: Project): Boolean {

        return try {

            api.createProject(
                mapOf(
                    "title" to project.title,
                    "description" to project.description
                )
            )

            true

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            false
        }
    }
}

package com.example.matule.ui

import android.content.Intent
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import com.example.matule.data.Repository

class SplashActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

        val repo = Repository(this)

        if (repo.isLogged()) {
            startActivity(Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java))
        } else {
            startActivity(Intent(this, LoginActivity::class.java))
        }

        finish()
    }
}

🟢 ШАГ 7 — LOGIN (Sprint 3)

📁 ui/LoginActivity.kt

kotlin
package com.example.matule.ui

import android.content.Intent
import android.os.Bundle
import android.widget.*
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.lifecycle.lifecycleScope
import com.example.matule.R
import com.example.matule.data.Repository
import kotlinx.coroutines.launch

class LoginActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_login)

        val repo = Repository(this)

        val etEmail = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etEmail)
        val etPassword = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etPassword)
        val btn = findViewById<Button>(R.id.btnLogin)

        btn.setOnClickListener {

            val email = etEmail.text.toString()
            val password = etPassword.text.toString()

            if (!email.matches(Regex("^[a-z0-9]+@[a-z0-9]+\\.ru$"))) {
                Toast.makeText(this, "Неверный email", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
                return@setOnClickListener
            }

            lifecycleScope.launch {

                val success = repo.login(email, password)

                if (success) {
                    startActivity(Intent(this@LoginActivity, MainActivity::class.java))
                    finish()
                } else {
                    Toast.makeText(this@LoginActivity, "Ошибка входа", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

kotlin
package com.example.matule.ui

import android.os.Bundle
import android.widget.*
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.lifecycle.lifecycleScope
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
import com.example.matule.R
import com.example.matule.data.Repository
import com.example.matule.domain.Product
import kotlinx.coroutines.launch

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private var fullList = listOf<Product>()
    private lateinit var adapter: ProductAdapter

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val repo = Repository(this)
        adapter = ProductAdapter()

        val recycler = findViewById<RecyclerView>(R.id.recycler)
        recycler.adapter = adapter

        lifecycleScope.launch {
            fullList = repo.getProducts()
            adapter.submit(fullList)
        }

        findViewById<Spinner>(R.id.spinnerCategory)
            .onItemSelectedListener =
            object : AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener {

                override fun onItemSelected(
                    parent: AdapterView<*>,
                    view: android.view.View?,
                    position: Int,
                    id: Long
                ) {

                    val category =
                        parent.getItemAtPosition(position).toString()

                    if (category == "ALL") {
                        adapter.submit(fullList)
                    } else {
                        adapter.submit(
                            fullList.filter {
                                it.category == category
                            }
                        )
                    }
                }

                override fun onNothingSelected(parent: AdapterView<*>?) {}
            }
    }
}

📁 5️⃣ RecyclerView Adapter полностью

kotlin
class ProductAdapter :
    RecyclerView.Adapter<ProductAdapter.Holder>() {

    private var list = listOf<Product>()

    fun submit(newList: List<Product>) {
        list = newList
        notifyDataSetChanged()
    }

    inner class Holder(view: View) :
        RecyclerView.ViewHolder(view) {

        val title: TextView = view.findViewById(R.id.tvTitle)
        val price: TextView = view.findViewById(R.id.tvPrice)
        val btnAdd: Button = view.findViewById(R.id.btnAdd)
    }

    override fun onCreateViewHolder(
        parent: ViewGroup,
        viewType: Int
    ): Holder {

        val view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)
            .inflate(R.layout.item_product, parent, false)

        return Holder(view)
    }

    override fun getItemCount() = list.size

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: Holder, position: Int) {

        val product = list[position]

        holder.title.text = product.title
        holder.price.text = "${product.price} ₽"

        holder.btnAdd.setOnClickListener {
            CartManager.add(product)
            Toast.makeText(
                holder.itemView.context,
                "Добавлено",
                Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
            ).show()
        }

        holder.itemView.setOnClickListener {
            ProductBottomSheet(product)
                .show(
                    (holder.itemView.context as AppCompatActivity)
                        .supportFragmentManager,
                    "sheet"
                )
        }
    }
}

📁 8️⃣ BottomNavigation логика (в MainActivity)

Добавить в onCreate:

kotlin
val bottomNav = findViewById<BottomNavigationView>(R.id.bottomNav)

bottomNav.setOnItemSelectedListener {

    when (it.itemId) {

        R.id.nav_home -> true

        R.id.nav_cart -> {
            startActivity(Intent(this, CartActivity::class.java))
            true
        }

        R.id.nav_projects -> {
            startActivity(Intent(this, CreateProjectActivity::class.java))
            true
        }

        else -> false
    }
}

📁 9️⃣ CartActivity

kotlin
class CartActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_cart)

        val tv = findViewById<TextView>(R.id.tvCart)

        tv.text = CartManager.get()
            .joinToString("\n") { it.title }

        findViewById<Button>(R.id.btnCheckout)
            .setOnClickListener {

                Toast.makeText(
                    this,
                    "Заказ оформлен",
                    Toast.LENGTH_LONG
                ).show()

                CartManager.clear()
                finish()
            }
    }
}

interface ApiService {

RetrofitClient.kt

kotlin
object RetrofitClient {

    private const val BASE_URL = "https://your-pocketbase-url/"

    val api: ApiService by lazy {
        Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
            .create(ApiService::class.java)
    }
}

TaskRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
class TaskRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService
) : TaskRepository {

    override suspend fun getTasks(): List<Task> {
        return api.getTasks().items.map {
            Task(it.id, it.title, it.description)
        }
    }

    override suspend fun addTask(title: String, description: String) {
        api.addTask(
            mapOf(
                "title" to title,
                "description" to description
            )
        )
    }
}

🟢 6. DI

NetworkModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    @Provides
    fun provideApi(): ApiService = RetrofitClient.api

    @Provides
    fun provideRepository(api: ApiService): TaskRepository =
        TaskRepositoryImpl(api)
}

🟢 8. RECYCLER ADAPTER (ПОЛНОСТЬЮ)

kotlin
class TaskAdapter : RecyclerView.Adapter<TaskAdapter.TaskViewHolder>() {

    private val list = mutableListOf<Task>()

    fun submitList(data: List<Task>) {
        list.clear()
        list.addAll(data)
        notifyDataSetChanged()
    }

    inner class TaskViewHolder(view: View) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(view) {
        val title: TextView = view.findViewById(R.id.tvTitle)
        val desc: TextView = view.findViewById(R.id.tvDesc)
    }

    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): TaskViewHolder {
        val view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)
            .inflate(R.layout.item_task, parent, false)
        return TaskViewHolder(view)
    }

    override fun getItemCount() = list.size

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: TaskViewHolder, position: Int) {
        val item = list[position]
        holder.title.text = item.title
        holder.desc.text = item.description
    }
}

🟢 10. HomeFragment.kt

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class HomeFragment : Fragment(R.layout.fragment_home) {

    private val viewModel: HomeViewModel by viewModels()
    private lateinit var adapter: TaskAdapter

    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        adapter = TaskAdapter()

        val recycler = view.findViewById<RecyclerView>(R.id.recycler)
        recycler.layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(requireContext())
        recycler.adapter = adapter

        viewModel.tasks.observe(viewLifecycleOwner) {
            adapter.submitList(it)
        }

        viewModel.loadTasks()
    }
}

🟢 11. AddTaskFragment.kt

kotlin
@AndroidEntryPoint
class AddTaskFragment : Fragment(R.layout.fragment_add) {

    private val viewModel: AddTaskViewModel by viewModels()

    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        val title = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etTitle)
        val desc = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.etDesc)
        val btn = view.findViewById<Button>(R.id.btnSave)

        btn.setOnClickListener {
            viewModel.addTask(
                title.text.toString(),
                desc.text.toString()
            )
        }
    }
}

package com.nikita.matule.data.remote

import com.nikita.matule.data.remote.model.TaskResponse
import retrofit2.http.Body
import retrofit2.http.GET
import retrofit2.http.POST

interface ApiService {

    @GET("api/collections/tasks/records")
    suspend fun getTasks(): TaskResponse

    @POST("api/collections/tasks/records")
    suspend fun addTask(
        @Body body: Map<String, String>
    )
}

data/remote/RetrofitClient.kt

⚠ ВСТАВЬ СВОЙ URL POCKETBASE

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.data.remote

import retrofit2.Retrofit
import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory

object RetrofitClient {

    private const val BASE_URL = "https://YOUR-POCKETBASE-URL/"

    val api: ApiService by lazy {
        Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
            .create(ApiService::class.java)
    }
}

data/repository/TaskRepositoryImpl.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.data.repository

import com.nikita.matule.data.remote.ApiService
import com.nikita.matule.domain.model.Task
import com.nikita.matule.domain.repository.TaskRepository
import javax.inject.Inject

class TaskRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService
) : TaskRepository {

    override suspend fun getTasks(): List<Task> {
        return api.getTasks().items.map {
            Task(it.id, it.title, it.description)
        }
    }

    override suspend fun addTask(title: String, description: String) {
        api.addTask(
            mapOf(
                "title" to title,
                "description" to description
            )
        )
    }
}

🔥 ШАГ 8. DI

di/NetworkModule.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.di

import com.nikita.matule.data.remote.ApiService
import com.nikita.matule.data.remote.RetrofitClient
import com.nikita.matule.data.repository.TaskRepositoryImpl
import com.nikita.matule.domain.repository.TaskRepository
import dagger.Module
import dagger.Provides
import dagger.hilt.InstallIn
import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent

@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    @Provides
    fun provideApi(): ApiService = RetrofitClient.api

    @Provides
    fun provideRepository(
        api: ApiService
    ): TaskRepository = TaskRepositoryImpl(api)
}

🔥 ШАГ 10. RECYCLER ADAPTER (ПОЛНЫЙ)

TaskAdapter.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.presentation.home

import android.view.LayoutInflater
import android.view.ViewGroup
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
import com.nikita.matule.databinding.ItemTaskBinding
import com.nikita.matule.domain.model.Task

class TaskAdapter : RecyclerView.Adapter<TaskAdapter.TaskViewHolder>() {

    private val list = mutableListOf<Task>()

    fun submitList(data: List<Task>) {
        list.clear()
        list.addAll(data)
        notifyDataSetChanged()
    }

    inner class TaskViewHolder(
        private val binding: ItemTaskBinding
    ) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(binding.root) {

        fun bind(task: Task) {
            binding.tvTitle.text = task.title
            binding.tvDesc.text = task.description
        }
    }

    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): TaskViewHolder {
        val binding = ItemTaskBinding.inflate(
            LayoutInflater.from(parent.context),
            parent,
            false
        )
        return TaskViewHolder(binding)
    }

    override fun getItemCount() = list.size

    override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: TaskViewHolder, position: Int) {
        holder.bind(list[position])
    }
}

🔥 ШАГ 11. FRAGMENTS

HomeFragment.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.presentation.home

import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
import androidx.fragment.app.viewModels
import androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager
import com.nikita.matule.R
import com.nikita.matule.databinding.FragmentHomeBinding
import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint

@AndroidEntryPoint
class HomeFragment : Fragment(R.layout.fragment_home) {

    private lateinit var binding: FragmentHomeBinding
    private val viewModel: HomeViewModel by viewModels()
    private val adapter = TaskAdapter()

    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        binding = FragmentHomeBinding.bind(view)

        binding.recycler.layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(requireContext())
        binding.recycler.adapter = adapter

        viewModel.tasks.observe(viewLifecycleOwner) {
            adapter.submitList(it)
        }

        viewModel.loadTasks()
    }
}

AddTaskFragment.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.presentation.add

import com.nikita.matule.R
import com.nikita.matule.databinding.FragmentAddBinding
import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint

@AndroidEntryPoint
class AddTaskFragment : Fragment(R.layout.fragment_add) {

    private lateinit var binding: FragmentAddBinding
    private val viewModel: AddTaskViewModel by viewModels()

    override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {

        binding = FragmentAddBinding.bind(view)

        binding.btnSave.setOnClickListener {
            viewModel.addTask(
                binding.etTitle.text.toString(),
                binding.etDesc.text.toString()
            )
        }
    }
}

🔥 ШАГ 12. MAIN ACTIVITY

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment
import androidx.navigation.ui.setupWithNavController
import com.nikita.matule.databinding.ActivityMainBinding

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

    private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

        binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
        setContentView(binding.root)

        val navHost =
            supportFragmentManager.findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host) as NavHostFragment

        binding.bottomNav.setupWithNavController(navHost.navController)
    }
}

🔥 2. DATASTORE (JWT хранение)

data/local/TokenManager.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.data.local

import android.content.Context
import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.edit
import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.stringPreferencesKey
import androidx.datastore.preferences.preferencesDataStore
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.first

private val Context.dataStore by preferencesDataStore("auth")

class TokenManager(private val context: Context) {

    companion object {
        private val TOKEN_KEY = stringPreferencesKey("jwt_token")
    }

    suspend fun saveToken(token: String) {
        context.dataStore.edit {
            it[TOKEN_KEY] = token
        }
    }

    suspend fun getToken(): String? {
        return context.dataStore.data.first()[TOKEN_KEY]
    }

    suspend fun clear() {
        context.dataStore.edit { it.clear() }
    }
}

🔥 3. OKHTTP INTERCEPTOR (JWT)

data/remote/AuthInterceptor.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.data.remote

import com.nikita.matule.data.local.TokenManager
import kotlinx.coroutines.runBlocking
import okhttp3.Interceptor
import okhttp3.Response

class AuthInterceptor(
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : Interceptor {

    override fun intercept(chain: Interceptor.Chain): Response {

        val token = runBlocking { tokenManager.getToken() }

        val request = chain.request().newBuilder()

        token?.let {
            request.addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer $it")
        }

        return chain.proceed(request.build())
    }
}

🔥 4. RETROFIT С ИНТЕРЦЕПТОРОМ

RetrofitClient.kt (обновленный)

kotlin
object RetrofitClient {

    private const val BASE_URL = "https://YOUR-POCKETBASE-URL/"

    fun create(tokenManager: TokenManager): ApiService {

        val client = OkHttpClient.Builder()
            .addInterceptor(AuthInterceptor(tokenManager))
            .build()

        return Retrofit.Builder()
            .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
            .client(client)
            .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
            .build()
            .create(ApiService::class.java)
    }
}

🔥 6. ROOM

data/local/entity/TaskEntity.kt

kotlin
package com.nikita.matule.data.local.entity

import androidx.room.Entity
import androidx.room.PrimaryKey

@Entity(tableName = "tasks")
data class TaskEntity(
    @PrimaryKey val id: String,
    val title: String,
    val description: String
)

TaskDao.kt

kotlin
@Dao
interface TaskDao {

    @Query("SELECT * FROM tasks")
    suspend fun getAll(): List<TaskEntity>

    @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.REPLACE)
    suspend fun insertAll(tasks: List<TaskEntity>)

    @Query("DELETE FROM tasks")
    suspend fun clear()
}

AppDatabase.kt

kotlin
@Database(
    entities = [TaskEntity::class],
    version = 1
)
abstract class AppDatabase : RoomDatabase() {
    abstract fun taskDao(): TaskDao
}

🔥 7. DI ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ

NetworkModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object NetworkModule {

    @Provides
    fun provideTokenManager(
        @ApplicationContext context: Context
    ) = TokenManager(context)

    @Provides
    fun provideApi(
        tokenManager: TokenManager
    ): ApiService = RetrofitClient.create(tokenManager)
}

DatabaseModule.kt

kotlin
@Module
@InstallIn(SingletonComponent::class)
object DatabaseModule {

    @Provides
    fun provideDb(
        @ApplicationContext context: Context
    ): AppDatabase =
        Room.databaseBuilder(
            context,
            AppDatabase::class.java,
            "matule.db"
        ).build()

    @Provides
    fun provideDao(db: AppDatabase) = db.taskDao()
}

🔥 8. REPOSITORY OFFLINE-FIRST

TaskRepositoryImpl.kt (обновленный)

kotlin
class TaskRepositoryImpl @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val dao: TaskDao
) : TaskRepository {

    override suspend fun getTasks(): List<Task> {
        return try {
            val remote = api.getTasks().items

            val entities = remote.map {
                TaskEntity(it.id, it.title, it.description)
            }

            dao.clear()
            dao.insertAll(entities)

            entities.map {
                Task(it.id, it.title, it.description)
            }

        } catch (e: Exception) {
            dao.getAll().map {
                Task(it.id, it.title, it.description)
            }
        }
    }

    override suspend fun addTask(title: String, description: String) {
        api.addTask(mapOf("title" to title, "description" to description))
    }
}

🔥 9. LOGIN VIEWMODEL

kotlin
@HiltViewModel
class LoginViewModel @Inject constructor(
    private val api: ApiService,
    private val tokenManager: TokenManager
) : ViewModel() {

    val error = MutableLiveData<String>()

    fun login(email: String, password: String) {

        viewModelScope.launch {
            try {
                val response = api.login(
                    AuthRequest(email, password)
                )
                tokenManager.saveToken(response.token)
            } catch (e: Exception) {
                error.value = "Ошибка авторизации"
            }
        }
    }
}
